[She]53-her was less than a foot away as [she]53-her stared [him]54-he down

with anger pouring off of [her]53-her . [He]54-he ’d seen [her]53-her angry before but [he]54-he expected steam to start coming out of [her]53-her ears at any moment . [His]54-he own anger was rising to the surface . How dare [she]53-her talk to [him]54-he like that ? [He]54-he felt a low growl rumble from [his]54-he throat . [He]54-he closed the small gap between [them]59-them , crushing [his]54-he lips onto [hers]53-her . [He]54-he grabbed [her]53-her neck to pull [her]53-her closer , pushing [his]54-he tongue against [her]53-her lips , demanding entrance . [She]53-her did n’t know where [her]53-her body ended and [his]54-he began . [Her]53-her hands slipped up behind [his]54-he neck pulling [him]54-he even closer .

Chapter One

Chapter Nine

Chapter Eleven

The week flew by quickly . [Jasmine]20-jasmine made incredible progress with [her]20-jasmine packing and had the local charity stop by twice because the items were piling up and filling [[her]20-jasmine living room]1295-her living room . On Friday morning [Derek]19-derek was signing the final papers and [the movers]1297-the movers were coming to pick up [her]20-jasmine things at noon . [She]20-jasmine woke up with both a feeling of excitement and sadness . [She]20-jasmine found [herself]20-jasmine looking forward to moving to [the new place]1298-the new place . It was all a little bit exciting . [The previous owners]295-the previous owners were already vacated and [Derek]19-derek had sent in [the cleaning crew]1300-the cleaning crew yesterday , so all that was left was getting the keys and moving in . [Derek]19-derek went to [the office]265-the office and called [her]20-jasmine a couple hours later , letting [her]20-jasmine know all the papers were signed and they were clear to move . [He]19-derek ’d be [there]134-there in an hour to help [her]20-jasmine with the final things [she]20-jasmine needed done . [Jasmine]20-jasmine slowly walked around [[her]20-jasmine once homey place]1303-her once homey place and could n’t stop the tears that streaked down [her]20-jasmine cheeks . [This home]2106-this home had been [her]20-jasmine and [Jacob]32-jacob ’s first sense of real security . [She]20-jasmine had been so proud when [she]20-jasmine signed [her]20-jasmine name on those papers and knew [the place]1740-the place was [hers]20-jasmine and [no one]81-no one could take it from [her]20-jasmine and now [she]20-jasmine was walking away from [it]1740-the place .
